block.para: Shows how to create an &EVlong; scheduled event that invokes an &LAMlong; function. Configure &EV; to use a cron expression to schedule when the &LAM; function is invoked. In this example, you create a &LAM; function by using the &LAM; Java runtime API. This example invokes different &AWS; services to perform a specific use case. This example demonstrates how to create an app that sends a mobile text message to your employees that congratulates them at the one year anniversary date.
For complete source code and instructions on how to set up and run, see the full example on GitHub.
